title: Sports Scheduling Web Application
description: Developed a full-stack sports scheduling app for admins and players. Enabled game management and user authentication.

title: Plant Disease Detection using CNNs
description: Directed a plant disease detection project using CNNs (VGG19, AlexNet, ResNet18). Launched a real-time detection web app. Published research showing ResNet's superior accuracy due to skipped connections.

title: Hostel Complaint System System
description: Developed a web app for managing hostel complaints. Improved communication between students and admins.

title: E-commerce Platform Platform
description: Developed an e-commerce platform. Won Best Project Award for 'Campus Cart. alfdjsdjfjlsdlkjsdfjaj'

title: Digital Rupee Sentiment Analysis
description: Implemented ML algorithms for Digital Rupee sentiment analysis. Analyzed 2,500+ YouTube comments and Twitter posts. Found positive sentiment outweighed negatives. Filtered out irrelevant data for accurate NLP classification.
